Summary: formation of lights in sky with sound
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bolder Junction
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details A formation of about 6 coloured lights appeared onthe SW horizon. The path took them strait over head. The spread of light gave itthe look of a large aircraft, but when the light past under a high cloud therewas no aircraft between the 6 bright points of lights. There were only lightsblue sky and a few high clouds. I was on Trout lake running an out boardmotor,and i could not hear anything but I expected a sonic boom judbing from thespeed of the lights and the fact they were in the atmosphere. There was none.the lights left going NE.People on shore who could not see the sky reported tome that they heard a strange sound in the sky unlike any other aircraft. Thesepeople spent a lot of time withe plains their son is a pilot. What did I see?
